title: Low ping and high fps and still have delay lag
body:
I have been dorming since the beginning of last semester with no internet problems (September or August 2016).  I play League of Legends in my free time and have run into trouble recently when trying to play it.  In game I have low ping, high fps and I am still getting delay lag.  I have ruled out all other computer side problems.  I did a full virus scan, re-installed league, and Reset my PC (resetting it to factory default).  I see no reason for the lag to have suddenly started and have no idea if I am the only one that is currently facing this problem.  I do not even know if there is anything you guys can do to help but I am just running out of ideas.  I would really like to be able to fix this because I would like to spend what little free time I do have on something that I want to do.  Speedtest.net by Ookla - The Global Broadband Speed Test results gauge me at 2 ping, 16 mbsp down, and 15 up when pinging the IP 134.139.190.14
I also see no packet loss when I open the command prompt and ping the league server with the command ping 104.160.131.1 -t

I have no idea what is wrong and I am hoping someone at the tech desk would be able to help me out.

replies.body: Can you describe the "lag" in a bit more detail? This word is often used as a catch-all term and can describe many different issues with various culprits. If you can provide more details, I'll be able to offer you more accurate troubleshooting steps to address the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jIHTAVd7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T03:28:07.603+0000)
>
> Can you describe the "lag" in a bit more detail? This word is often used as a catch-all term and can describe many different issues with various culprits. If you can provide more details, I'll be able to offer you more accurate troubleshooting steps to address the issue.

I'll give this example based on playing Riven cause it is really apparent in such a ability reliant champion.  Say, maybe 1 or more out of 5 ability commands register late or awkwardly by about a second.  

If I move any champion around via click movement commands, a period of 5 seconds with about 20 clicks, occasionally the movement commands appears to be delayed or not register at all.

I know its probably hard to understand what I am explaining but basically any commands that I put forth for my champion are subject to a weird delay occasionally.  It makes trading and dodging abilities extremely hard.  It is reflected in my last few games that CSing is also affected by this "delay" lag

It definitely seems like you're experiencing either *extreme packet buffering* or *packet loss*. These issues are caused by problems between your PC and our servers and are often the result of network settings that conflict with League. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are configured properly.

Let me know if this resolved your symptoms!
